ModMetaData.name: Storage Search A17
ModMetaData.author: Killface
ModMetaData.description:
This Mod allows you to search by name in storage filter tab. Original A12 version by meonester. Updated for A17 by Killface.
Includes Hauling Hysteresis by Vendan https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=26958.0
As of 2016-09-28, this mod also - allows apparel to be searched by name in the edit window
